description:
Yugi and his friends are in awe over Grandpa’s collection of Duel Monsters cards, but when #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Kaiba, kidnaps Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown and avenge his Gramps!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senritsu no Blue Eyes White Dragon
戦慄のブルーアイズ・ホワイト・ドラゴン
